mapper.select: select p.partyid as partyid, p.partyname as partyname, p.partycomment as partycomment, p.user_userid as user_userid from party p left join partymember m on p.partyid = m.party_partyid where m.user_userid = #{param1};
select * from party p join partymember m on p.partyid = m.party_partyid and m.user_userid = #{param1};
select * from user join partymember on partymember.user_userid = user.userid where partymember.party_partyid = #{param1}

select partymemo.party_partyid as party_partyid, partymemo.user_userid as user_userid, partymemo.partymemocontent as partymemocontent, partymemo.partymemo as partymemo, partymemo.datetime as datetime, user.username as username from partymemo join user on partymemo.user_userid = user.userid where party_partyid = #{param1} order by datetime desc;
mapper.insert: insert into partymemo(party_partyid, partymemocontent, user_userid) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3});
